courses.ARBC 1 — First-Year Arabic:
Course: ARBC 1 — First-Year Arabic
Credits: 5
Description: Introduction to Arabic language and Arabic-speaking culture with practice in all four language skills: listening, speaking, reading, and writing. Intended for students with no previous study of Arabic as well as heritage speakers.
Requirements: No additional requirements listed.
